title: Export an object as a dxf file with RhinoScript
question: Hello I would like to be able to automatically save each object of my rhino model in a different dxf file. I know it can be done with a rhino script, but I donâ€™t know what code to use to export objects to dxf. Could someone help me?

code_blocks.code:
for i,obj in enumerate(sel_objs):
        rs.UnselectAllObjects()
        rs.UnselectAllObjects()
        rs.SelectObject(obj)
        name = rs.ObjectName(obj)
        
        e_file_name = '"{}-{}.{}" '.format(filename[:-4],name,ft.lower())
        print(e_file_name)
        #runs the export using the file name/path and your settings
        rs.Command("-_Export "+e_file_name+" _Enter", False)
    rs.UnselectAllObjects()
